text: Bar kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand, gunohe dar on ci [pes az hukmi tahrimi saroʙ] xurdaand, nest, [alʙatta] dar surate ki [az muharramot] parhez kunand va imon ʙiovarand va korhoi soista ancom dihand, sipas parhezkori kunad va imon ʙiovarand, on goh [ʙes az pes] parhezkori kunand va neki namojand. Va Alloh taolo nakukoronro dust medorad
